remarks: Change the bound variable of a restricted uniqueness quantifier using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement:
cbvralv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrmov $p |- ( E* x e. A ph <-> E* y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
